name: Steam Hams - But it's a GameBoy Game

args.text:
I hope your ready
for an unforgetta-

I were to order
fast food-

and disguise it as
my own cooking?

why is there smoke
coming out your-

I hope your ready
for mouth watering

Skinner:No no, I
said Steamed Hams!

Skinner: Yes! it's
a regional dialect

Chalmers: Uh huh,
Eh what Region?

Chalmers: Really?
well im from udica

and i have never
heard anyone-

Skinner: Oh, not
in udica no, its-

Skinner: ho ho ho
ho, NO!

Chalmers: yes, and
you call them-

Skinner: S'cuse me
for one second...

good time was had
by all!

In this part of
the Country?

Mom: Seymour! the
house is on fire!

Chalmers: You
steamed a good ham

no pun intended,
but your fired!

author: BcMaster12
